## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}
summary(cars)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.

```{r}
# list含兩個lists, 子層list又各含兩個vectors

  list(
    c("108-1"), # 可只寫 "108-1"
    c("高級會計學","高等統計學")
       ),
  list(
    c("108-2"),
    c("食在拉丁美洲")
  )
)

```
```{r}
# list含兩個lists, 子層list又各含兩個vectors

  `108學年第1學期`=list(
    c("108-1"), # 可只寫 "108-1"
    c("高級會計學","高等統計學")
       ),

    c("108-2"),
    c("食在拉丁美洲")
  )
)
print(`小明108學年課表C`)
```


```{r}
# 108-1 
course1_1081 <- 
  list(
    name="個體經濟學",
    teacher="Alice",
    grade=85
  )
course2_1081 <-
  list(
    name="總體經濟學",
    teacher="Mark",
    grade=78
  )
`108-1修課記錄` <- 
  list(
    course1_1081,
    course2_1081
  )

# 108-2
course1_1082 <- 
  list(
    name="作業研究",
    teacher="Jason",
    grade=90
  )
`108-2修課記錄` <- 
  list(
    course1_1082
  )

# 整合兩學期
`每學期修課記錄` <- list(
  `108-1`=`108-1修課記錄`,
  `108-2`=`108-2修課記錄`
)

# 完成記錄
`小明的修課記錄` <- 
  list(
    name="小明",
    semesters=`每學期修課記錄`
  )
```
```{r}
`小明的修課記錄` <- 
  list(
    name="小明",
    semesters=
      list(
        `108-1`=
          list(
            year=108,
            semester=1,
            courses=
              list(
                list(
                  name="個體經濟學",
                  teacher="Alice",
                  grade=85
                ),
                list(
                  name="總體經濟學",
                  teacher="Mark",
                  grade=78
                )
              )
            ),
        `108-2`=
          list(
            year=108,
            semester=2,
            courses=
              list(
                list(
                  name="作業研究",
                  teacher="Jason",
                  grade=90
                )
              )
            )
      ) 
    )
```

```{r}
today <- list(
  list("台北市",c(highest_temp = 25),c(lowest_temp = 18)),
  list("新北市",c(highest_temp = 24),c(lowest_temp = 15)))
tomorrow <- list(
  list("台北市",c(highest_temp = 25),c(lowest_temp = 18)),
  list("新北市",c(highest_temp = 24),c(lowest_temp = 15)))

weather <- list(today,tomorrow)

print(weather)
```
